name: COROWNED
description:
Basically you're playing someone who read on facebook that only hand sanitizer can cure the covid19 so you shoot people with your syringe launcher to cure them, while avoiding being COROWNED.

So this is a school project and it was fun to make.
It is a piece of garbage and it features the covid so everyone is already tired of it but hey.
Oh and since I used the cursed roblox death sound (I know) I disabled any payment system just to be sure.

Made with Unity and Bolt
